Package controller

Class PaymentController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController
controller.PaymentController
public class PaymentController
extends BaseController
This PaymentController class control the flow of the payment process in our AIMS Software.
Author:
hieud

  • Method Details

    • getExpirationDate

      private java.lang.String getExpirationDate​(java.lang.String date) throws InvalidCardException
      Validate the input date which should be in the format "mm/yy", and then return a String representing the date in the required format "mmyy" .
      Parameters:
      date - - the String represents the input date
      Returns:
      String - date representation of the required format
      Throws:
      InvalidCardException - - if the string does not represent a valid date in the expected format

    • payOrder

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> payOrder​(int amount, java.lang.String contents, java.lang.String cardNumber, java.lang.String cardHolderName, java.lang.String expirationDate, java.lang.String securityCode)
      Pay order, and then return the result with a message.
      Parameters:
      amount - - the amount to pay
      contents - - the transaction contents
      cardNumber - - the card number
      cardHolderName - - the card holder name
      expirationDate - - the expiration date in the format "mm/yy"
      securityCode - - the cvv/cvc code of the credit card
      Returns:
      Map represent the payment result with a message.
